tool_description: Webchain codebase is fully compatible with Ethereum Classic interface. Although WEB is not just a fork of ETC, we changed whole hashing algorithm to a customized Lyra2-Webchain version.
title: Webchain

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webchain.p.rapidapi.comWebchain"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webchain.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
